pullRequest.title: [WFLY-11848][WFLY-13338] Work re log checking in tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-11848 -- Follows up on #12278 by using the test utils @tmiyargi wrote that allow more efficient log checking.


https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13338 -- a small enhancement to those utils


The two parts are unrelated except that they both involve those utils and I'm crossing those things off my todo list.

nodes.bodyText: Cruft, It doesn't matter, but this is an unused variable.
filters method argument should be passed to isMessageInLogFile as an argument
filters method argument should be passed to isMessageInLogFile as an argument

commit.message: [WFLY-11848] Tests if JNDI bindings is correctly built in case there is no appName.
[WFLY-11848] Use TestLogHandlerSetupTask and LoggingUtil for efficient log verification
[WFLY-13338] Add the ability to pass custom predicates to the LoggingUtil log scanning methods

beforeCommit.message: [WFLY-13338] Add the ability to pass custom predicates to the LoggingUtil log scanning methods

afterCommit.message: [WFLY-13338] Add the ability to pass custom predicates to the LoggingUtil log scanning methods
